name: id8
description:
For leaders and decision makers of organizations, id8 will develop a distinct brand identity using customer experience research and design thinking, that will help your organization stand out from your competitors and drive higher profits.
When we listen, your customers tell us what they need -- in their words.Â As a leading brand identity agency, id8 develops brands based on your customer's needs. We offer brand positioning, strategy, naming and identity services.
